CompanyDescription: TTEC Holdings, Inc. ("TTEC", "the Company", "we", "our" or "us") is a leading global customer experience technology and services company focused on the design, implementation and delivery of transformative customer experience outcomes for many of the world's most iconic and disruptive brands. Since our inception in 1982, we have been helping clients deliver frictionless customer experiences, strengthen their customer relationships, brand recognition and loyalty through personalized interactions, significantly improve their Net Promoter Score ("NPS"), and lower their total cost to serve by enabling and delivering simplified, consistent and seamless customer experience across channels and phases of the customer lifecycle. Our customer experience thought leadership is substantiated, with innovative programs that differentiate our clients from their competition.  ... More ...
